column5: Just wondering if anyone has any opinions on this place?  Me and the family are thinking of bringing our trailer up there for a week.  It says they have serviced sites, and a playground for the kids. Their website isn't really that helpful, any info would be fantastic.
somebody has to know something about this place....what about you Temagami folk??

Hi Mike - I have never stayed there, but I have driven thru it..  We camp at Marten River PP (which is right across the river) every year - it is a great park...  To me, it seemed like the camping area at Land O Lakes was mostly seasonal campers who leave their campers there all year..
Did you see any kind of playground??
Yeah - If I recall,there was a pretty big multi-coloured playground by the beach..?
